article: Jane walked into the hospital and shivered . She did not like them because  _  were always so cold, and everything in them was so white. It's still me." The nurse came in to  _  on her grandmother. She used a thermometer to take her grandmother's  _  and a stethoscope to listen to her heart. Jane was all ears, examining each instrument carefully. The nurse was really  _  toward her grandmother. She softened her pillows and made sure she was  _  comfortably.
